posts.content:
No real big nerfs on clerics or mage classes. Infact they get a lot of boons. I myself being the underdog fellow I am trying to think of a way to take some of them down.

Arelith Rules: Level 30 cap. Low Magic Item Server. With major buffs to caster classes. Must take 3 levels of class.

Also, now you in pre making a character you can choose up to 3 character gifts.( cant stack them)
These do not count toward the +12 cap.
Gift of Might (+2 STR)
Gift of Grace (+2 DEX
Gift of Endurance (+2 CON
Gift of Learning (+2 INT
Gift of Insight (+2 WIS
Gift of Confidence (+2 CHA

The rest of the gifts are gold boons, invis, darkness, and 32 SR at level 1 things like that.

I am of course going to take the Intel and Dex one.

Idea is either a Ranger/Assassin with a high death attack DC.

Or some sort of Rogue, Fighter, Assassin build.

Elf or Human

Duel wielding I guess?

Help would be appreciated .

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
For comparison metric vs. whatever else floats by... a 30-level DA monk assassin (mage killer type):

Monk 9/Fighter 6/Assassin 15, Human (Monk8/Ftr4/Asn8 pre-epic)

STR: 11
DEX: 17 (26)
CON: 12
WIS: 8
INT: 16
CHA: 8

Hitpoints: 282
Saves (F/W/R): 18/13/26 (21/16/29 vs. spells)
Other save boni: Mind Effects: +2, Traps: +2, Poison: +6
BAB: 21
AB (max, naked): 33 (melee)/31 (TWF), 30 (ranged)
AC (naked/mundane armor/shield only): 27/30

Hide 33(41), Move Silently 33(41), Spellcraft 12(15), Tumble 33(41), UMD 31(30), remaining --> 98

Combat: KD/IKD. Cleave, ITWF w/kamas, DA DC 28 for 15 rounds, 8 APR (10 w/hasted flurry), speed +130%,
dmg (mundane kamas) 7-12 (crit 19-20 x2)

Defense: Evasion/Imp Evasion, Dodge, Mobility

Comments: Base DA DC is relatively low so APR is crucial to succeeding enough checks. Closing speed important against casters. Monk save & attack progression assures some stability when subjected to diverse attacks. IMO a modest investment into trap skills with a portion of the remaining skill points (depending on trap availability on the server) would increase the overall playability. If you are willing to live without the +1AB & +2AC from prowess & amorskin resp. (i.e. 32 melee AB & 25/28 AC), you can take Epic Skill Focus in Hide & Move Sil to raise the base level to 51 on each. Your choice. Against damage shields, swap in an xbow or sling after the DA does its thing
